message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000.  I think it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $11,500. Would you be willing to consider that?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for a price closer to $13,500. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment.
Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,800?
